channel.title: CVE Feed for latepoint -- LatePoint Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for latepoint -- LatePoint Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-2472|2024-06-14T13:35:18.415Z -- latepoint -- latepoint%20plugin
item.description: The LatePoint Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'start_or_use_session_for_customer' function in all versions up to and including 4.9.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view other customer's cabinets, including the ability to view PII such as email addresses and to change their LatePoint user password, which may or may not be associated with a WordPress account.

item.title: CVE-2024-2472|2024-06-14T09:36:37.719Z -- latepoint -- latepoint%20plugin
item.description: The LatePoint Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data and modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'start_or_use_session_for_customer' function in all versions up to and including 4.9.9. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view other customer's cabinets, including the ability to view PII such as email addresses and to change their LatePoint user password, which may or may not be associated with a WordPress account.
